sentences.sContent: Wales is poorer and more agricultural than England and, because the Welsh have their own language, they do not feel themselves nationally or culturally to be a part of the English people.
sentences.sContent_eng: Wales is poorer and more agricultural than England and, because the Welsh have their own language, they do not feel themselves nationally or culturally to be a part of the English people.
sentences.sCn: 威尔士与英格兰比起来更穷且更农业化，因为威尔士有自己的语言，所以威尔士人并不觉得自己在民族上和文化上是英国人的一部分。

synos.tran: 赖帐，赖赌债逃走；逃避责任

trans.tranCn: 威尔士的；威尔士人的；威尔士语的
trans.tranOther: relating to Wales, its people, or its original language
